price: Kafir olub ayələrimizi yalan sayanlara gəlincə, onlar Od sakinləridirlər. Onlar orada əbədi qalacaqlar!
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
